summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3730 for the improvement of 48th Avenue South from Ferdinand Street to Dawson Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45798, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
